item.title: Venice-Bound ‘Secret of a Mountain Serpent’ Boards The Open Reel for International Sales, Clip Unveiled (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: “Secret of a Mountain Serpent” has secured international sales representation with boutique outfit The Open Reel ahead of its world premiere at the Venice Film Festival. Directed by Indian
